Explore Eugene Home Departments Central Services City Manager's Office Sustainable Eugene Sustainability at Home Neighborhood Sharing Neighborhood Sharing Sharing Economies The choices we make about purchasing and maintaining our "stuff" can have a big impact on our personal finances as well as the environment.  Perhaps you can find what you need at a second hand store or fix your broken item instead of throwing it away.  Maybe your neighbor is willing to lend their canning equipment or share the cost of renting
